about_the_game:
The golden set contains Caliber+ and 12 hand-picked operators. They will be added to your account fully prepared for battle, at max level and using the default upgrades set that we've tried to optimize for all modes.

This set is great for a quick start in-game, or as an addition to your existing operator collection.

Caliber+


Caliber+ lets players save time and Credits when upgrading their operators, and grants permanent access to User Battle creation and expanded account statistics.

  • Your operators will always be at maximum level. All previously purchased and newly-bought operators will always enjoy the maximum level with the default upgrades.*
  • Get operators and their personal skills faster. You won't have to spend Credits to upgrade an operator anymore. Instead, use this currency to buy new operators and alternative upgrades.
  • Access to User Battle creation. You'll have permanent access to the User Battles creation even without active Premium.
  • Access to expanded account statistics. Track the stats of your K/D/A in ranked battles, and extensive data on your playing: eliminations, support, healing, damage dealt, and hours played as each class and in every mode.

*The default upgrades have the optimal upgrade set, so that your new operators can be prepared for battle from the get-go. If needed, alternative upgrades can be purchased using Credits.

Operator set


The set contains 12 operators, 3 of each class.

  • Assaults: EZAPAC’s Faro (Spain), 22 SpN’s Plut (Russia), Jiaolong’s Shàowèi (China).
  • Supports: Vympel’s Almaz (Russia), BOPE’s Barreira (Brazil), 22 SpN’s Kit (Russia).
  • Medics: 22 SpN’s Karavai (Russia), CST’s Bones (USA), Arystan’s Buggy (Kazakhstan).
  • Marksmen: AMF’s Víðarr (Sweden), Jiaolong’s Cánglóng (China), SSO’s Komar (Russia).

You can test operators in Practice mode before buying the set.

If you already have this operator on your account, you will instead receive Credits equal to the cost of the operator in the game client.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, Cruelty or Gore.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
